OOC: Well I think that you should wait that Azure post that his char 
left the base.

BIC:

Nighlight started to feel uneasy, she had the feeling that things 
was leading to a danger for all

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> "When I want a child's lip, I'll be sure and ask for it kid.  
Right now I don't think Rodimus should take a chance like this.  
Your stranded, low on supplies; you can't afford to take a risk, 
even in the name of honour." Malice said to Dragos.  "I would have 
detained him and cure his illness while he was offline.  That's what 
I was referring to.  Thats what the Rodimus I knew did."
> 
> Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:Dragos: Stepped in front of 
Malice looking into Malice's Optics sensor, "you listen to Me Malice 
what Rodimus Prime just did was done out of Honor. Azure was once a 
proud Worrior oh wait still is. Azure is sick right now. Are you 
sugesting that Rodimus should of been a How would you put it a 
INSANLY NEANDERTHULIC BEAST to try and wage war inside the Base with 
Azure becouse Azure can't Control his self right now. Well I think 
not. He did it to protect his men. I would of made the same Decision 
if I was in his place," Dragos Chuckles a bit, "Just remember this I 
and my crew is a group of assasins or mercs you can call us. I would 
love to stick my foot up anyone's Exast manifold if they chose to 
Argue with Rodimus Orders." he draws his sword, "I will not think 
twice about scrapping anyone I repeat ANYONE who choses to argue 
with a commanding officer," He seaths his Kitana and starts to walk 
out of the room towards the exit.
> 
> bustercross365 <bustercross365@y...> wrote: Malice watched with 
cold optics as the Predacon passed him and left.  
> He advanced into the CR room and decided to address Rodimus.
> "Your just going to let a Predacon leave your base?  You didn't do 
> the same thing with a Decepticon, as I recall.  Why did you 
release 
> him?" Malice demanded.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> >  
> > Rodimus stepped aside to let Azure leave. They now knew where 
they 
> had to go. If the matrix wasn't on earth with the survivor council 
> then it was lost somewhere on Tripred cybertron.
> >  
> > He almost wished that his troops would not have asked any 
further 
> questions, but they did and Azure was now a Predacon.
> >  
> > Rodimus lets out a sigh, letting this sink in. Azure had 
sacrificed 
> his programming, his very spark to bring back Nightlight. Rodimus 
> would forever owe him.
> >  
> > Rodimus Prime(whispering to himself): Thank you, Azure...
> >  
> > Rodimus takes Nightlight's hand tightly, sensing the guilt she 
felt.
> > 
> >
